content:
Yes @Timothy Adams you should be able to get a SMART Health Card from MyIR Mobile. Older cards will no longer be valid, so you may have to download a new one if yours is from more than ~a week ago.

The Maryland issuer is the VCI Directory at https://github.com/the-commons-project/vci-directory/blob/8beb62e22d45017a94677a065ed05cce159e7245/vci-issuers.json#L2218-L2220
